Posts.Content: Hi Ladies, I'm a researcher at Stanford University looking to develop a new treatment for vaginal dryness specifically for breast and gynecologic cancer survivors. My team is conducting a survey to determine what type of treatment is desired, and I would appreciate 5-10 minutes of your time. The link to the survey is here: Link removed. Please read solicitation policy. Thank you very much for your help! Kathryn
Posts.Title: Cancer Treatment Side Effects - Vaginal Symptoms
